siteMetadata.title: Just another fancy blog.
siteMetadata.subtitle: The beginning is never easy. But we can get used to the difficulties and add a baggage of experience along the way.

frontmatter.title: Trip to Japan: Booking multiple connections tickets
frontmatter.description: As I was planning my trip, my top choice stood on affordable flights. As risky as it is sometimes, I want to share some disadvantages of cheap traveling through SEASIA by multiple connections flights

frontmatter.title: How I discovered, that remote work not only allows you to work from home
frontmatter.description: I worked remotely from another country to improve my mental and physical health. I want to share quick note how it worked out, and what my future steps might be
